sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-autocomplete
          :items="users"
          small-chips
          clearable
          color="grey"
          label="参加者を追加"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="id"
          multiple
          :value="value"
          @input="$emit('input', $event)"
          @change="updateSelected"
        >
        </v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'GuestSelectForm',
  props: ['value'],
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('users', ['users', 'user'])
  },
  created() {
    this.fetchUsers();
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('users', [
      'fetchUsers',
      'addUsers',
      'updateUser',
      'deleteUser',
      'setUser'
    ]),
    updateSelected(selectedItems) {
      // 選択されたゲストのselected属性をFALSEに変更する処理
      const updatedUsers = this.users.map(user => {
        if (selectedItems.includes(user.id)) {
          return { ...user, selected: false };
        }
        return user;
      });
      this.addUsers(updatedUsers);
    }
  }
};
</script>
